settings.question: What is Supermix Studio?
settings.text:
Interactive, custom kids' clothing. We empower kids, teens, and moms, to hyper-personalize the basics they already love to wear. 

• We believe every child is unique & deserves a voice. Supermix gives them a platform to be whomever they choose.
• Created to inspire self-expression, and light that special spark that “makes you, YOU", Supermix puts you in the design chair in a way never before possible.
• We make it easy to design something that's eco-friendly, and lets you wear your heart and originality on your sleeve, or wherever you want to place a patch of your favorite thing.

Your Choice. Your Message. Your Vibe.

settings.question: How does Supermix Studio work?
settings.text:
Kids Clothes, Reimagined. Celebrate your individuality with that perfect, customized piece, that is 100% originally yours.

Step 1 - Select a style: denim jackets, sweats (in 8 colors), recycled backpacks, or custom hats.
Step 2 - Choose from 500+ custom patches to add to your design, anywhere you want.
Step 3 - Start designing with our intuitive drag and drop Supermix Customizer.

 So fun and easy to use, even a 5 year old can design like a pro in no time.

settings.question: What ages is Supermix for?
settings.text: Supermix is for babies through big kids and teens, with some matching pieces for moms. All clothing is gender neutral.

settings.question: How long until I receive my order?
settings.text: Once you’ve placed your order, Supermix goes to work bringing your design to life. Everything is customized by hand, in-house with love, by our customizer specialists, in Catskills, New York. It can take up to 2 weeks (3 weeks during Holidays so order early!) to receive your custom design.

settings.question: Can I return my custom design?
settings.text:
Because all designs are customized, all purchases are non-refundable. Please keep in mind that all Supermix apparel is oversized so there’s plenty of room for kids to grow into. This means buy your usual size and if you’re in between sizes, size down.

Should you have any issues with your order please contact: support@supermixstudio.com.

settings.question: What if I just want to add a name without designing?
settings.text: In a hurry or just don't want to design something yourself? We have you covered! Supermix Founder Jennifer Stein Bischoff has designed several of our best sellers for kids and made them available under Kids' 'Best Seller' section. Simply choose which design you like most, and even add a name to it.

settings.question: Can I design on mobile?
settings.text: The Supermix Studio Customizer is currently only available on desktop or tablets. Our mobile version is still in beta and will be available in the near future.

settings.question: How do I care for my customized clothing?
settings.text:
To ensure your clothing stays in great shape over time:

• Close all fasteners before washing.
• Machine wash cold, gentle cycle.
• ​Wash with like colors. ​
• Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. ​
• Tumble dry low. ​
• Remove promptly. ​Do not iron.

It's very important to follow these instructions to enjoy your custom design and keep it looking great.

settings.question: Is Supermix Eco-Friendly?
settings.text:
We make thoughtful, sustainable decisions across our entire product development, manufacturing, and supply chain.

•We use BCI cotton, the world’s leading sustainability initiative for cotton.
•Our backpacks are made from 100% recycled polyester. 
•Our packaging is made with recovered trash and printed using algae ink.

We believe that style and sustainability go hand in hand.

settings.question: What makes our patches so special?
settings.text:
When you see and feel our patches IRL, it's obvious!

• 500+ premium patches, all designed in-house to coordinate perfectly with our apparel and accessories.
• Highest quality, novelty materials like embroidery, chenille, sequin, flip sequin, and more.
• Empowering messaging: Planet Positive, Equality, Pride, Civic Engagement, to start.

It’s literally impossible for your designs not to look amazing!

settings.question: What are Patch Points?
settings.text:
Instead of dollars, patch points are used to pay for Supermix patches.

• Each of Supermix’s 500+ premium patches has a patch point value assigned to it.
• Patch point values range from 10 patch points for smaller patches to 70 patch points for our Super Size patches.
• Each design comes with enough Patch Points (around 100) to help get you started.
• Once you choose your style, your patch points will automatically be uploaded to your Supermix design session.

settings.question: Can I purchase more Patch Points?
settings.text:
You bet. Patch it up as much as you want!

• Add a Patch Point Pack: the larger the Patch Point Pack, the greater the savings.
• Your extra Patch Points will be instantly loaded into the customizer so you can keep designing without missing a beat.
• Supermix keeps track of all your Patch Points and displays them in your account balance at all times.

settings.question: Is there a way to earn free Patch Points?
settings.text:
We want to reward you for helping us spread the word about our first of its kind design platform.

• Super fun and easy for all ages to share and earn FREE Patch Points.
• So many ways to earn: create account, follows, reviews, shares, birthdays, and more.
• Earn up to 250 Patch Points in all.
• Give your friends 50 Patch Points on their first purchase & get 50 Patch Points for your next design.

settings.question: How do I login to my Supermix account?
settings.text: Once you create an account, you can login and work on your design as often as you like. Simply click on the ‘login’ link in the upper right of the Supermix website. Our customizer works only on desktop and tablet. Mobile currently in beta coming soon.

settings.question: How do Supermix Gifts work?
settings.text: Looking for that perfect present? Gift someone a Supermix design session: it's something that they’ll never forget and wear all over town. You can even add additional Supermix Patch Points to give them extra patches to boost their design!

settings.question: Is there a Supermix Affiliate Program?
settings.text: We have a very limited Supermix Stylist program. Once your kids start wearing Supermix, they become walking billboards. We’d rather pay you to help us share Supermix than spend on traditional adverstising. Stylists earn up to a 20% commissions on all sales. As a Stylist, you direct customers to your personal page, and we take care of the rest: inventory, orders, customer service, shipping, and more. It's like a Supermix mini-franchise, with none of the risk.

• Supermix puts you in the design chair in a way never before possible by empowering kids, teens, and moms, to hyper-personalize the basics they already love to wear.
